title: Chase
meta_description: A visual helper for the 8 requirements needed for a Chase Bank password on their websites and mobile apps.

sections.name: Requirements
shortcuts: Must be between 8 and 32 characters long
Must contain a combination of a number, letter, or special character
Must be different than your previous five passwords
Must not match your User ID
Must not include more than 2 identical characters (111 or aaa)
Must not include more than 2 consecutive characters (123 or abc)
Must not use the name of the financial institution (JPM, MORGAN, CHASE)
Must not be a commonly used password (password1)

sections.name: Additional Info
shortcuts: Passwords can only contain the following special characters: # $ % ' ^ , ( ) * + : | = ? @ / [ ] _ ` { } ~ \ ! ; -
